name: audience_metrics
description: Aggregates key campaign performance metrics from stg_campaigns, grouping by target audience. This model provides insights into how different audience segments perform across various metrics like conversion rate, ROI, cost, clicks, and impressions.

columns.name: Target_Audience
columns.description: The specific demographic or behavioral segment targeted by the campaigns. This acts as the primary dimension for aggregation in this model.

columns.name: campaign_count
columns.description: The total number of distinct campaigns associated with this target audience.

columns.name: avg_conversion_rate
columns.description: The average conversion rate across all campaigns targeting this audience. Typically calculated as (Total Conversions / Total Clicks or Impressions) averaged per campaign, depending on the specific definition in the source.

columns.name: avg_roi
columns.description: The average Return on Investment (ROI) across all campaigns targeting this audience. Typically calculated as ((Revenue - Cost) / Cost) averaged per campaign.

columns.name: avg_acquisition_cost
columns.description: The average cost to acquire a customer (CAC) or achieve a conversion goal across all campaigns targeting this audience.

columns.name: total_clicks
columns.description: The total number of clicks accumulated across all campaigns targeting this audience.

columns.name: total_impressions
columns.description: The total number of impressions served across all campaigns targeting this audience.

columns.name: overall_ctr
columns.description: The overall Click-Through Rate (CTR) for this target audience, calculated as (Total Clicks / Total Impressions) across all associated campaigns for the segment.
